law.catch_line: This title does not apply to a transaction of:...

text.section:
This title does not apply to a transaction of:
the United States or an instrumentality of the United States; or
a state or an instrumentality or political subdivision of a state.

A county or municipal corporation of the State may not:
require a person to get authorization to do business performing or selling a home improvement; or
regulate the qualifications necessary to do that business.

This title does not limit the power of a county or municipal corporation:
to regulate the character, performance, or quality of a home improvement by having a system of inspections and permits designed to:
ensure compliance with and help to enforce applicable State and local building laws; or
enforce other laws necessary to protect the public health and safety; or
to adopt a system of inspections and permits that requires:
submission to and approval by the county or municipal corporation of plans and specifications for an installation, before construction of the installation begins; and
inspection of work done.
